source:
<!--
  ## Introduction

  Use [`amp-vine`](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-vine-v0.1.md) to embed Vine videos in your AMP HTML files.
--><!-- -->
<!doctype html>
<html ⚡>
<head>
<meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>amp-vine</title>
  <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
  <!-- ## Setup -->
  <!--
    Import the `amp-vine` component in the header.
  -->
  <script async custom-element="amp-vine" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-vine-0.1.js"></script>
  <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-vine/index.html">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
  <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
</head>
<body>

  <!-- ## Basic usage -->
  <!--
    A Vine embed has equal width and height. You can find the `vineid` in the each vine's URL.
  -->
  <amp-vine width="400" height="400" data-vineid="MdKjXez002d">
  </amp-vine>

  <!-- ## Responsive layout -->
  <!--
    Resposive layout works as well. In that case you can use any value for `height` and `width` as long as they are the same.
  -->
  <amp-vine width="1" height="1" layout="responsive" data-vineid="MdKjXez002d">
  </amp-vine>
</body></html>

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

Use [`amp-vine`](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-vine-v0.1.md) to embed Vine videos in your AMP HTML files.
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

Use amp-vine to embed Vine videos in your AMP HTML files.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

Use [`amp-vine`](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-vine-v0.1.md) to embed Vine videos in your AMP HTML files.

sections.doc_: Import the `amp-vine` component in the header.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Import the `amp-vine` component in the header.

<style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
</head>
<body>

sections.doc_: A Vine embed has equal width and height. You can find the `vineid` in the each vine's URL.
sections.normalizedDoc_: A Vine embed has equal width and height. You can find the `vineid` in the each vine's URL.

sections.doc_: Resposive layout works as well. In that case you can use any value for `height` and `width` as long as they are the same.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Resposive layout works as well. In that case you can use any value for `height` and `width` as long as they are the same.
